Package com.xith3d.scenegraph

Interface Summary
Bounds  
GeomDataInterface A standard interface for manipulating geometry data.
GeometryUpdater  
GeomInterface This interface defines a standard set of methods for interacting with dynamic geometry while hiding the underlying implementation
GeomUpdateInterface
NodeUpdater Node updater interface is designed to allow special code to adjust a node's appearance if it is going to be rendered.
TimerInterface Timer interface.
 

Class Summary
AmbientLight AmbientLight defines an ambient light source.
Appearance Appearance is a component object of a Shape3D node that defines all rendering state attributes for that shape node.
Background Background defines either a solid color or a background image that is used to fill the window at the beginning of each new frame.
BackgroundSound @author Davud J.
Billboard Simple triangle array that makes sure that the billboard is facing the view at all times.
BoundingBox Axis aligned bounding box volumes
BoundingLeaf BoundingLeaf defines a bounding region that can be referenced by other leaf nodes.
BoundingPolytope A set of planes that prescribe a convex, closed polygonal bounding region.
BoundingSphere A spherical bounding volume.
BranchGroup BranchGroup is root of a branch graph of a scene.
Canvas3D
Clip Clip defines the far clipping plane used to clip objects.
ColoringAttributes ColoringAttributes defines attributes that apply to color mapping.
DecalGroup DecalGroup node guarantees that its children will be rendered in their index order.
DepthComponent  
DepthComponentFloat  
DirectionalLight DirectionalLight defines an oriented light source with an origin at infinity.
ExponentialFog ExponentialFog extends the Fog leaf node by adding a fog density.
Fog Fog defines a common set of attributes that contorl fog, or depth cueing, in the scene.
Foreground Foreground defines geometry which is always rendered first.
FragmentProgram  
GeomContainer Master container for all types of geometry data.
GeomData Base abstract class for all GeomData implementations
Geometry Geometry defines attributes that apply to .
GeometryArray GeometryArray defines attributes that apply to .
GeometryStripArray GeometryStripArray defines attributes that apply to .
GeometryTranslocator A geometry translocator provides an optimized method for drawing many copies of a geometry array at different locations.
GeomFloatData
GeomIndexedContainer Builds indexed geometry.
GeomNioFloatData  
GeomNioIntData  
GraphicsConfigTemplate3D  
Group Group is a general purpose grouping node.
ImageComponent ImageComponent defines attributes that apply to .
ImageComponent2D ImageComponent2D defines attributes that apply to .
ImageComponent3D ImageComponent3D defines attributes that apply to .
IndexedGeometryArray  
IndexedGeometryStripArray @author Davud J.
IndexedLineArray  
IndexedLineStripArray @author Davud J.
IndexedQuadArray @author Davud J.
IndexedTriangleArray  
IndexedTriangleFanArray @author Davud J.
IndexedTriangleStripArray @author Davud J.
Leaf Leaf is an abstract class for all scene graph nodes that have no children.
Light Light defines a common set of attributes that control lights.
LinearFog LinearFog extends the Fog leaf node by adding a pair of distance values, in Z, at which fog should start obscuring the scene and should maximally obscure the scene.
LineArray LineArray defines attributes that apply to .
LineAttributes LineAttributes defines attributes that apply to .
LineStripArray LineStripArray defines attributes that apply to .
Link A Link leaf node allows an application to reference a shared graph, rooted by a SharedGroup node, from within a branch graph or another shared graph.
ListEnumeration
Locale Locale is point in the universe that acts as the local origin for for a set of sub-graphs, each of which is rooted by BranchGroup node objects.
Material Material defines attributes that apply to .
MediaContainer  
Morph The Morph leaf node permits an application to morph between multiple GeometryArrays.
Node Node is the base class for all node objects in a scene graph.
NodeComponent NodeComponent is the base class for all node component objects in scene graph Node objects.
OrderedGroup OrderedGroup node guarantees that its children will be rendered in their index order.
PointArray PointArray defines attributes that apply to .
PointAttributes PointAttributes defines attributes that apply to .
PointLight PointLight defines a point light source located at some point in space and radiating in all directions.
PointSound Point sounds are those sounds which exist in the point in space within the transform groups it exists.
PolygonAttributes PolygonAttributes defines attributes that apply to .
QuadArray QuadArray defines attributes that apply to .
RenderingAttributes RenderingAttributes defines attributes that apply to .
SceneGraphObject The base class for all objects contained in a scene graph.
ShaderProgram  
Shape3D Shape3D is a class for all scene graph nodes that have no children.
SharedGroup
Sound  
SpotLight SpotLight defines a point light source located at some point in space and radiating in a specific direction.
Switch Switch group nodes allow an application to choose dynamically amoung a number of subgraphs.
TexCoordGeneration TexCoordGeneration defines attributes that apply to .
Texture Texture defines attributes that apply to .
Texture2D Texture2D defines attributes that apply to .
Texture3D Texture3D defines attributes that apply to .
TextureAttributes TextureAttributes defines attributes that apply to .
TextureCubeMap  
TextureUnitState  
Transform3D Is represented internally as a 4x4 floating point matrix.
TransformGroup TransformGroup node specifies a single spatial transformation, via a Transform3D object, that can position, orient and scale all of its children.
TranslocatorNode Insert package comments here
TransparencyAttributes TransparencyAttributes defines attributes that apply to .
TriangleArray TriangleArray defines attributes that apply to .
TriangleFanArray TriangleFanArray defines attributes that apply to .
TriangleStripArray TriangleStripArray defines attributes that apply to .
VertexProgram  
View
View.CameraMode Camera mode enum.
VirtualUniverse Top most container for a scenegraph.
 

Exception Summary
SceneGraphException The exception used by all of the scene graph objects and methods that throw checked exceptions.
SceneGraphRuntimeException The exception used by all of the scene graph objects and methods that throw checked exceptions.
 

Error Summary
IllegalSceneGraphOperation Indicates an illegal operation was performed on the scenegraph such as an attempt to assign multiple parent groups to a Node.
UnsupportedFunction Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
